**_Theses_ (학위논문)**

-   **석사(_Master of Science_)**: 김수형, _Automatic Extraction of Graphical Output Primitives from a Line Drawing_ (선도면으로부터 그래픽 출력요소의 자동 추출), Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology, Dec. 1987. (Text in English)


-   **박사(_Ph.D. of Enginnering_)**: 김수형, _Automatic Input of Line Drawings with Contour-based Picture Processing, Vectorization and Loop Recognition_ (외곽선 기반 영상처리, 벡터화 및 고리구조 인식을 통한 선도면의 자동 입력), Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology, Nov. 1992. (Text in English)





**_Doctoral Dissertation guidance_ 박사학위 논문지도**
